column1: 3197,"WN328","Programming","The MapsForge developers forked the Java Vectron Library [VTM](https://github.com/mapsforge/vtm) for Android, iOS and desktop systems of the OpenScienceMap and [released](https://groups.google.com/forum/#%21topic/mapsforge-dev/5w9Sl7Kljzk) version 0.6.0."

column1: Provided by the [OSM Software Watchlist](https://wambachers-osm.website/index.php/osm-software). Timestamp: 2017-07-22 21:29:55+02 UTC

20988,"WN749","OSM in the media","Pieter Vander Vennet led two surveillance camera mapping walks, in Ghent, Belgium, using MapComplete, [drawing](https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/Pieter%20Vander%20Vennet/diary/405672) press coverage from local TV, newspapers, and VTM, highlighting OpenStreetMap volunteers' efforts to map cameras for better transparency in urban spaces."
